# sdds-button

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                          | Type                                              | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`  | Control for disabled state of button | `boolean`                                         | `undefined` |
| `fullbleed` | `fullbleed` | Enables button to take 100% width    | `boolean`                                         | `undefined` |
| `size`      | `size`      | Size of button                       | `"" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xs"`                      | `''`        |
| `text`      | `text`      | Text to display inside a button      | `string`                                          | `''`        |
| `type`      | `type`      | Type of button                       | `"danger" \| "ghost" \| "primary" \| "secondary"` | `'primary'` |
